channel.title: Richard Pryor on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Richard Pryor on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Marlene Warfield, Actress in ‘Network’ and ‘The Great White Hope,’ Dies at 83
item.description: Trained on the New York stage — she worked with Cicely Tyson in ‘The Blacks’ — she also played Victoria Butterfield, one of Bea Arthur’s maids, on ‘Maude.’
